name: 4D Tic Tac Toe
description:
For anyone unfamiliar with Itch, the game is free. You are free to skip the donation.

I realized a while ago that you could make Tic-Tac-Toe in 3 dimensions, and then I asked myself: "Why stop at 3? Let's go to 4!" And thus this project was born. Watch the video for a full analysis.
